titles.title: For the relief of Christopher Urban.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 8/2/1995--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States for reimbursement for overpayment of individual Federal income tax.
